tool.name: Split Multiple Alterate Alleles VCF
tool.description: Where multiple alleles are listed by commas in a VCF, make each a separate entry.
tool.command: #if $input.is_of_type("vcf_bgzip") zcat $input > input.vcf && #end if python $__tool_directory__/split_mult_alleles_vcf.py #if $input.is_of_type("vcf_bgzip") "input.vcf" #else "${input}" #end if $output #if $unphase "${unphase}" #end if

param.name: unphase
param.label: Replace pipe symbol in phased genotypes with slash?

tool.help:
Where multiple alleles are listed by commas in a VCF, make each a separate entry. Place separate entries in new file.
usage: split_mult_alleles_vcf.py [-h] [--version] input output
positional arguments: input output --unphase Remove pipe symbol from genotypes before writing.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --version show program's version number and exit
